main

Class BusinessLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.BusinessLogic

  • public class BusinessLogic
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all the business logic to add, remove, check in, and check out books.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean addBooks(java.lang.String path)
      Takes in a file path to a CSV file, and it creates new books with that file's CSV information.
      static boolean checkInBook(java.lang.String input, java.lang.String choice, ListCallback listChanger)
      Checks in a book that matches the provided input and choice type (Title or ID).
      static boolean checkOutBook(java.lang.String input, java.lang.String choice, ListCallback listChanger)
      Checks out a book that matches the provided input and choice type (Title or ID).
      static java.util.ArrayList<Book> getBooksByTitle(java.lang.String title)
      Returns all books that have the same book title as the title argument.
      static void initializeAlerts()
      Initializes all the alerts that the BusinessLogic class uses to communicate important information to the user.
      static boolean removeBook(java.lang.String input, java.lang.String choice, ListCallback listChanger)
      Removes a book that matches the provided input and choice type (Title or ID).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • initializeAlerts

        public static void initializeAlerts()
        Initializes all the alerts that the BusinessLogic class uses to communicate important information to the user.

      • addBooks

        public static boolean addBooks(java.lang.String path)
        Takes in a file path to a CSV file, and it creates new books with that file's CSV information. Adds the new books to the book list if there were no errors with any of the entries.
        Parameters:
        path - The path of the CSV file that has the new books to add.
        Returns:
        The status of if the method finished successfully.

      • removeBook

        public static boolean removeBook(java.lang.String input,
                                 java.lang.String choice,
                                 ListCallback listChanger)
        Removes a book that matches the provided input and choice type (Title or ID). If there are multiple books that share a title with the book that is being removed, this method calls the listChanger callback and inputs the books.
        Parameters:
        input - The input string that should match a record in the book list.
        choice - The choice of title or id to compare the input to.
        listChanger - The callback to change the shown book list to a certain set of books if needed.
        Returns:
        The status of if the method finished successfully.

      • checkOutBook

        public static boolean checkOutBook(java.lang.String input,
                                   java.lang.String choice,
                                   ListCallback listChanger)
        Checks out a book that matches the provided input and choice type (Title or ID). If there are multiple books that share a title with the book that is being checked out, this method calls the listChanger callback and inputs the books.
        Parameters:
        input - The input string that should match a record in the book list.
        choice - The choice of title or id to compare the input to.
        listChanger - The callback to change the shown book list to a certain set of books if needed.
        Returns:
        The status of if the method finished successfully.

      • checkInBook

        public static boolean checkInBook(java.lang.String input,
                                  java.lang.String choice,
                                  ListCallback listChanger)
        Checks in a book that matches the provided input and choice type (Title or ID). If there are multiple books that share a title with the book that is being checked in, this method calls the listChanger callback and inputs the books.
        Parameters:
        input - The input string that should match a record in the book list.
        choice - The choice of title or id to compare the input to.
        listChanger - The callback to change the shown book list to a certain set of books if needed.
        Returns:
        The status of if the method finished successfully.

      • getBooksByTitle

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Book> getBooksByTitle(java.lang.String title)
        Returns all books that have the same book title as the title argument.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the books to find.
        Returns:
        All the books that match with selected title.
